name: Dinopult (DINOJAM #1)
description:
Follow a cute little dinosaur who wishes he was taller 🦖

This is a short children's book-like game, hope you enjoy it 🤗 Enable sound 🎵 and play full screen 💻

Some sound seems to crack, I'm not completely sure why or how to fix it 😒

Controls
  • Click/tap & drag to determine the angle and strength of the Dinopult.
  • Click/tap while your dino is in the air to make him turn 180° mid-air.
  • Get back to the catapult before you lose all your speed to go again.
  • Use the RETRY button if you get stuck.

This game was made for DINOJAM #1.

Like what I'm doing? Check out my Patreon or consider donating.
